problem: 如图,一位同学通过调整自己的位置,设法使三角板的斜边保持水平,并且边DE与点B在同一直线上,已知两条边DE=0.4m,EF=0.2m,测得边DF离地面AC=1.5m,CD=8m,则树高为()m．
comment: 本题考查了相似三角形的应用,解题的关键是从实际问题中整理出相似三角形的模型．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, a student tries to keep the hypotenuse of the triangular plate level by adjusting his position, and the edge DE is on the same straight line as the point B. It is known that the two edges DE = N_0, EF = N_1, and the measured edge DF is away from On the ground AC = N_2, CD = N_3, then the tree height is ().
